sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RΑCΟΝΙ, a populous town of Italy, in Piedmont, feated in a pleaſant plain, on the road from Savillan to Turin, on the rivers Grana and Macra. It belongs to the prince of Carignan, who has a handſome caſtle here. It is ſix miles from Savillan, and ſix from Carignan. E. Long. 7. 46. N. Lat. 44. 39.
